resources.string: Enable the Master Switch below to get started. Choose from one of the following triggers to set when the LED turns on/off while plugged in.
Welcome to LED control! Tap NEXT and grant root access when prompted.
Looks like your device is not rooted or you denied root access. This app NEEDS root access to work.
Your device is currently not supported by LED Control. This app is meant only for the Nexus 6, Moto X, Moto G and Moto E.
Plug in your charger to see changes
If you do not see the selected trigger acting immediately, please re-plug in your charger
Successfully set LED trigger on boot!
What\'s up? \nCheck out this cool app I installed to jazz out my phone\'s LED:\nhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kdb.ledcontrol

An app to set kernel specific charging triggers for your device's LED.

Thank you for purchasing LED Control Pro. You're awesome!
Please leave a rating on Play Store if you found this app useful.

Support: XDA       Source: Github
